name: flickr.places.getInfoByUrl
description: Lookup information about a place, by its flickr.com/places URL.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: A flickr.com/places URL in the form of /country/region/city. For example: /Canada/Quebec/Montreal

response:
<place place_id="4hLQygSaBJ92" woeid="3534" latitude="45.512" longitude="-73.554" place_url="/Canada/Quebec/Montreal" place_type="locality" has_shapedata="1">
  <locality place_id="4hLQygSaBJ92" woeid="3534" latitude="45.512" longitude="-73.554" place_url="/Canada/Quebec/Montreal">Montreal</locality>
  <county place_id="cFBi9x6bCJ8D5rba1g" woeid="29375198" latitude="45.551" longitude="-73.600" place_url="/cFBi9x6bCJ8D5rba1g">Montr√©al</county>
  <region place_id="CrZUvXebApjI0.72" woeid="2344924" latitude="53.890" longitude="-68.429" place_url="/Canada/Quebec">Quebec</region>
  <country place_id="EESRy8qbApgaeIkbsA" woeid="23424775" latitude="62.358" longitude="-96.582" place_url="/Canada">Canada</country>
  <shapedata created="1223513357" alpha="0.012359619140625" count_points="34778" count_edges="52">
    <polylines>
      <polyline>
            45.427627563477,-73.589645385742 45.428966522217,-73.587898254395, etc...
         </polyline>
    </polylines>
  </shapedata>
</place>

errors.title: Place URL required.The flickr.com/places URL was not passed with the API method.
Place not found.Unable to find a valid place for the places URL.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
